You can also browse all files on .tar.gz/">fossies.org or in the git repo.

htdocs/
HTML files of the web pages you are looking at.
css/
Directory containing example CSS files (cascaded style sheets).
web2ldap/
CSS files of the application.
etc/
web2ldap/
templates/
various HTML and LDIF templates for displaying entries and input forms and for setting defaults of new entries to be added
web2ldapcnf/
the configuration module package
  • __init__.py
  • hosts.py
  • plugins.py -- defines which plugin modules to import
systemd/
web2ldap-standalone.service
Starting web2ldap as stand-alone HTTP server with systemd.
apache2/
Example configuration files for WSGI integration with Apache httpd.
uwsgi/
Example configuration files for integration with UWSGI.
web2ldap/
the application's module package
app/plugins/
The pre-installed plugin modules
